com.gensym.message
Class MessageEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.gensym.message.MessageEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProcessMessageEvent
public class MessageEvent
extends EventObject

Normally MessageEvents are normally created by the class Message or the class Trace. Encapsulates message information that can work in a distributed environment. The translation occurs at the time getMessage is called, using a Resource resolved in the local Java VM.

See Also:
Resource, Serialized Form

NULL_SOURCE

Constructor Detail

MessageEvent

public MessageEvent(int level,
                    String key,
                    Class classKey,
                    Resource resource,
                    String messageLookup,
                    Object[] args)
Create a new MessageEvent. This signature does not use a registered key, so this is not the preferred constructor. Normally MessageEvents are created by the Message or the Trace.
Parameters:
level - the "verbosity". Higher is more verbose (less likely to be "listened" for).
key - an arbitrary String key for grouping MessageEvents
classKey - a Class to be associated with this MessageEvent. Allows for a hierarchical grouping of messages. Should normally be the class of the object creating the message.
resource - the Resource used to "translate" the full message text.
messageLookup - the key used to look up the full text in resource
args - the arguments used in a call to MessageFormat.format. Any null element is replaced by the string "" before the call to format.
See Also:
MessageEvent(int, MessageKey, Resource, String, Object[]).

MessageEvent

public MessageEvent(Object source,
                    int level,
                    String key,
                    Class classKey,
                    Resource resource,
                    String messageLookup,
                    Object[] args)
Creates a MessageEvent with a source.
Parameters:
level - the "verbosity". Higher is more verbose (less likely to be "listened" for).
key - an arbitrary String key for grouping MessageEvents
classKey - a Class to be associated with this MessageEvent. Allows for a hierarchical grouping of messages. Should normally be the class of the object creating the message.
resource - the Resource used to "translate" the full message text.
messageLookup - the key used to look up the full text in resource
args - the arguments used in a call to MessageFormat.format.
See Also:
MessageEvent(Object, int, MessageKey, Resource, String, Object[]).

Method Detail

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class EventObject

getMessage

public String getMessage()
                  throws MissingResourceException
Returns the localized, formatted message string for presentation to the final consumer of the MessageEvent (typically the end user). The elements of the Object array will be converted to strings using the toString() method. Any null element in argsis replaced by the string "" before the call to MessageFormat.format.

getMessageKey

public String getMessageKey()
The key that groups various MessageEvents

getMessageLevel

public int getMessageLevel()
The verbosity level of this MessageEvent. Higher is more verbose, and therefore less likely to be listened for

getMessageLookup

public String getMessageLookup()
Returns the string that is used to look for the translated message in the Resource

getResource

The Resource used to find the full text of the message
